text: Frederick Joseph Yates (25 July 1922 â€“ 7 July 2008) was an English artist. He was born in Urmston, His work was very much in the style of the late L. S. Lowry. Yates lived and worked all over England but in later years he was based in France. == References == Category:1922 births Category:2008 deaths Category:English painters Category:People from Lancashire
title: Fred Yates
